plot: Joan Alton is a defense counsel and the only person able to help a legal defender who's been framed for the brutal murder of his wife. While the defendant's secrets unveil, she will stop at nothing to catch the real killer.
title: Deviant Obsession
plot_es: Joan Alton is a defense counsel and the only person able to help a legal defender who's been framed for the brutal murder of his wife. While the defendant's secrets unveil, she will stop at nothing to catch the real killer.
plot_en: Joan Alton is a defense counsel and the only person able to help a legal defender who's been framed for the brutal murder of his wife. While the defendant's secrets unveil, she will stop at nothing to catch the real killer.
